plan: During the practice rounds, I will observe the market trends and test different strategies without making significant trades. I will focus on understanding the impact of dividends and interest rates on my portfolio. In the main experiment, I will aim to buy stocks when the price is below the buyback price of 14 and sell when the price is significantly higher, while also considering the potential dividends and interest on cash.
insight: The key insight from the initial setup is the importance of balancing between holding stocks for potential high dividends and keeping cash for the guaranteed 5% interest. The buyback price of 14 at the end of the experiment sets a ceiling for the value of the stock, influencing my trading decisions, especially as the experiment nears its end.
